video.title: Lagrange: The Flower of Rin-ne
video.synopsis: Friendly schoolgirl Madoka is contacted by Lan, a resident of the planet Le Garite, who seeks her help in saving humanity from a monstrous evil.

episodes.synopsis: Teenager Madoka befriends a mysterious girl named Lan and invites her to join a school club. That's when Lan asks if Madoka can pilot a robot.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Madoka learns she's going on a second mission, which involves battling another enemy.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: With Yoko's help, Madoka pulls herself together and renews her fight against the enemy, Ovid. Lan becomes  crippled by her fear toward the Vox.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A new girl named Munigami arrives at the school, and Lan doesn't trust her. Nonetheless, Madoka befriends her and invites her into the Jersey Club.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Lan wonders about Munigami's true agenda. Munigami reveals that she has the Memoria for the last remaining Vox -- and that she has a surprising ally.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Madoka aims to get revenge for what Villagiulio did to Muginami, but Muginami stops her. A mysterious flower rain begins to fall from the sky.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Muginami recalls moments she shared with Villagiulo back home. Madoka realizes she needs to be more sensitive to Muginami's feelings.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Asteria, the acting chairman of Novumundus, questions Madoka and others about Villagiulo's attack and then decides to ban Madoka from piloting Midori.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The Jersey Club plans a cultural festival. Izo is in a rebellious mood, determined to challenge Madoka to a duel and deal with the Vox pilots alone.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Lan and Muginami are assigned a mission they must keep secret from Madoka, but she learns about it from Asteria. Villagiulo plans a major attack.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: As Villagiulo's army advances, Lan and Nuginami begin their attack. Meanwhile, Yoko convinces Asteria to remove the ban on Madoka's Vox Aura.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: As Madoka loses control of Midori, the Lagrange flower rain spreads all across the city of Kamogawa. Madoka gets advice from a mysterious woman.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Madoka is thinking about her friends who left Earth and pondering career choices when Lan returns to Kamogawa and asks her to pilot Midori again.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Madoka tries to stop the fight between Lan and Munigami, but the Le Garite troops interfere. As a last resort, she calls on Villagiulo for help.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Asteria asks Madoka to participate in an experiment that could convince the warring planets to use the power of the Vox for peace.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Villagiulio and Dizelmine meet to discuss their home planets' relations. An Ovid crash-lands near Kamogawa, and the pilot's identity is a surprise.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: After Madoka and her friends are welcomed aboard Dizelmine's ship, the presence of Yurikano is revealed -- as is Dizelmine's twisted plan.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Lan, Munigami and Midori work together to rescue Madoka, who has switched bodies with Yurikano thanks to Dizelmine's experiment.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Although she must use force, Madoka gets Dizelmine and Villagiulo to make peace. Madoka, Lan and Munigami vow not to use their Voxes as weapons again.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: After Madoka lets a student named Reiko into the Jersey club, she learns Reiko wants to pilot a robot and explains they no longer use Voxes to fight.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Lan and Munigami struggle with telling Madoka that they will return to their home planets after graduation. Asteria makes a shocking announcement.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Villagiulo and Dizelmine meet face-to-face. As Madoka and her friends arrive, Dizelmine's Vox releases a wave of dark energy that envelops the Earth.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: As the darkness released by Dizelmine's Vox spreads, Madoka and her friends wake in a strange place -- the Rinn-ne -- and face a grueling battle.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: As Madoka and the others leave the Rin-ne and return to the real world, the darkness is lifted. The Jersey Club forms branches on other planets.
episodes.title: Episode 24
